attributes.action: reduce road tax and petrol prices on vespas, and to remove V.A.T. on fred perry shirts and sta press jeans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we, as mods, feel our way of life is being hindered by the unfair and provocative costs. we,as mods, demand a fairer deal. and the reintroduction of wigan pier as an all night mod club
